overview: Guy joined 3i in 1987. He is Global Managing Director for Growth Capital and a member of the 3i Management Committee based in London. During his time at 3i, he spent five years as Country Managing Director in France and successfully established 3iâ€™s business in the Benelux region in the late 1990s. He has played a key role in developing the business and been actively involved in a number of deals including Supergroup, GFI, Camaieu, Keolis, Poliris, Educational Information Group, Crown Bedding and De Telefoongids.

relationships.title: Managing Partner and Executive Vice President
